name: Arcade Artist
description: Arcade Artist is an experience that combines the unique exploration of a creative playground along with casual arcade activities that makes this VR experience perfect for all age groups.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 480 equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X compatible Additional Notes: Best experience is with a GeForce 1080
